channel.title: Changing Menus
channel.description:
how i change the frame that appears at first at first loggin for example it says which IP u come, the rules, etc... how i change that to looks like the screen that appears when u enter to the wildy, or the other one that looks like the skillz menu
post any help

item.title: Changing Menus
item.dc:creator: @VyperX VyperX
item.description:
@VyperX wrote:

alright ive found what u said

i think this is what must be changed

sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to KakitoScape !", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@DO NOT ASK TO BE ADMIN OR MOD", 8148); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150); sendQuest("@red@======", 8151); sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152); sendQuest("@whi@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153); sendQuest("@whi@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();
